name: piston-town-tiles
prompt: 16x16 pixel-art tileset for a cozy starter town (Piston Town): small houses, rail tracks, crossings, grass, trees, dirt paths, signposts. Warm muted palette, clean outlines, consistent tile boundaries, game-ready grid. Retro video game aesthetic.
negative_prompt: photo, 3d render, realistic, smear, low contrast, noisy edges, non-grid layout, text, watermark
